content.question: The graph above shows velocity as a function of time for an object moving in a straight line. What is the average acceleration of the object during the first <math alttext="8" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>8</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> seconds?

choices.label: <math alttext="negative 2.0 meters per second squared" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2.0</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace></mrow><msup><mrow><mtext>m/s</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="negative 0.5 meter per second squared" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>0.5</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace></mrow><msup><mrow><mtext>m/s</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="0 meters per second squared" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace></mrow><msup><mrow><mtext>m/s</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="positive 2.0 meters per second squared" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>2.0</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace></mrow><msup><mrow><mtext>m/s</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
